srm_bus_predictor  #(BUSTYPE) ) bus_in
Observed bus transacations of type BUSTYPE are received from this port and processed.

bit skip_read_error_msg
Debug variable to switch off error messages from failing reads.
virtual class srm_array_entry#( type  T  =  int ) extends srm_reg#(T)
Models the entry of the register array.
class srm_base_coverage
Base class for coverage model.
virtual class srm_base_field
Base class for a field in a register.
virtual class srm_base_field_policy
Base class for access policy on a field per address map.
class srm_base_handle extends uvm_object
Client options for configurating the access.
virtual class srm_base_reg extends srm_component
Base class for the register.
class srm_bus_adapter extends uvm_object
Abstract base class for bus adapter.
class srm_bus_predictor #( type  BUSTYPE  =  int ) extends uvm_component
Abstract base class for updating the register model with the transaction on the bus.
class srm_component
A node in the design tree hierarchy.
class srm_field#( type  T  =  int ) extends srm_base_field
Template class to model the fields in a register.
class srm_rc_policy extends srm_base_field_policy
Read clear Field.
class srm_reg#( type  T  =  int ) extends srm_base_reg
Template class to represent a register.
class srm_reg_array #( type  T  =  int ) extends srm_component
A register array is a register with number of entries > 1.
class srm_ro_policy extends srm_base_field_policy
Read Only Field
class srm_rs_policy extends srm_base_field_policy
Read Set Field
class srm_rw_policy extends srm_base_field_policy
Read Write Field
class srm_search_adapter extends uvm_object
Select the correct bus adapter instance from the hierarchy.
class srm_utils
Utilities used my core classes.
class srm_w0c_policy extends srm_base_field_policy
Write 0 Clear Field.
class srm_w0crs_policy extends srm_base_field_policy
Write 1- no effect, 0- clears, Read: sets
class srm_w0s_policy extends srm_base_field_policy
Write 0 Set Field.
class srm_w0src_policy extends srm_base_field_policy
Write 1- no effect, 0-sets , Read: clears
class srm_w0t_policy extends srm_base_field_policy
Write 1- no effect, 0- toggle, Read: no affect
class srm_w1c_policy extends srm_base_field_policy
Write 1 Clear Field.
class srm_w1crs_policy extends srm_base_field_policy
Write 1- clear, 0-no effect , Read: sets
class srm_w1s_policy extends srm_base_field_policy
Write 1-clears the bit, 0-no effect, Read: no affect
class srm_w1src_policy extends srm_base_field_policy
Write 1- set effect, 0-no effect , Read: clears
class srm_w1t_policy extends srm_base_field_policy
Write 1 Set Field.
class srm_wc_policy extends srm_base_field_policy
Write Clear Field.
class srm_wcrs_policy extends srm_base_field_policy
Write Clear Read Set.
class srm_wo_policy extends srm_base_field_policy
Write as is, Read: error
class srm_woc_policy extends srm_base_field_policy
Write clears all bits, Read: error
class srm_wos_policy extends srm_base_field_policy
Write sets all bits, Read: error
class srm_wrc_policy extends srm_base_field_policy
Write Read Clear Field.
class srm_wrs_policy extends srm_base_field_policy
Write Read Seta Field.
class srm_ws_policy extends srm_base_field_policy
Write Set Field.
class srm_wsrc_policy extends srm_base_field_policy
Write Set Read Clear Field.

virtual task store( srm_base_handle  handle )

bit  skip_duplicate )

ref  srm_data_t  bytes )

ref  srm_data_t  bytes )
